page.title: 18Leisure and entertainment
page.content: Leisure in{Linwood}can be{active}but {expensive . Linwood Sports Centre}was established just under ten years ago. There area wide variety of sports which can be played eg.{martial arts, {squash, badminton, tennis & football. There is also a{creche}facility for adults with young children . There are also a number of{amateur {football teams}who play frequently. For older members of the community , {bowling}is available not only at the sports centre but also at several outdoor clubs in the area. Regular {discos}are held in the{Tweedie Hall for younger members of the community. There is also an{amusement arcade associated with a cafe, though school children are banned from it during the day. All of these activities are expensive to provide and thus are expensive to use.
